content.html: This afternoon I've been playing with an idea: adding OpenTelemetry to IaC tools (e.g. Terraform here) to get a visual insight into what takes the most time to provision. Here you can see TF needs to call CreateFunction four times before the IAM role becomes consistent
content.value:
This afternoon I've been playing with an idea: adding OpenTelemetry to IaC tools (e.g. Terraform here) to get a visual insight into what takes the most time to provision.

Here you can see TF needs to call CreateFunction four times before the IAM role becomes consistent
